mapper.select: select t1.bidPrice,t3.id,t3.nickName,t3.headImgUrl,t3.label,t4.gradeName ggradeName,count(1) AS fans,t5.imgUrl from ddw_goddess t1 left join ddw_my_attention t2 on t1.userId=t2.goddessId and t1.storeId = #{storeId} LEFT join ddw_userinfo t3 on t1.userId = t3.id left join ddw_goddess_grade t4 on t4.id=t3.goddessGradeId left join (SELECT a.userId,imgUrl from ddw_photograph a,ddw_goddess b where a.userId = b.userId ORDER BY a.createTime desc limit 1)t5 on t1.userId = t5.userId group by t1.userId,t1.bidPrice,t5.imgUrl order by count(1) desc limit #{start},#{end}
SELECT count(*) from ddw_goddess where storeId = #{storeId}
